instruction: Convert the given paragraph into three sentences.
input: The novel tells the story of James Bond, an agent of the Secret Service, and his mission to discover the reason behind the disappearance of two fellow operatives in Jamaica.
output: The novel tells the story of James Bond, an agent of the Secret Service. He is tasked to investigate the disappearance of two fellow operatives in Jamaica. Bond travels to No's Caribbean island to uncover the truth.
